item.description:
Wouldn’t you love to treat your friends and loved ones with beautiful, handmade birthday cards? At the A-Musing Birthday Cards class, you will make five (5) adorable cards (including one for a belated birthday wish) that you can send to those special people in your life! We’ll be using A Muse Artstamps’s wonderful line of papers, wood-mounted rubber stamps, ribbons, and embellishments to create truly special greetings. All materials and supplies will be provided.

***You must register online in order to attend the class. To register, visit http://www.abeille.us...

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: A Muse Birthdays Galore
